author: jpavel
body:
Several duplicated (and one wrong) definitions of various EDProducers in tau realm were removed and replaced them by cloning of one default configuration. This change was necesary to make it clear for trigger confDB which default config to take. No changes in physics output are expected, as the default configuration was not changed as c++ was not touched at all

@mbluj, @Martin-Grunewald
title: removed duplicated definitions of EDProducers
